home.text_base_description: This fully remodeled, sun-filled 2BD/1BA home in sought after SoMa/Hayes Valley is one not to miss! Boasting high ceilings and large windows, the kitchen features quartz countertops, serene white shell tile and barely used stainless steel appliances. Enjoy a bathroom with a designer's touch from the pristine tile to the modern shower design and gold accents. Fully renovated and custom designed less than two years ago, the new gray vinyl flooring is both modern and practical (water and scratch-proof). The full-size washer-dryer and fresh paint makes this a perfect, move-in-ready home. The unit is located above the lobby / ground level with a patio deck connected to the master bedroom, offering the perfect space to relax and enjoy coffee or a glass of wine. Set on a cobblestone block, next to the Valencia Corridor at the intersection of SoMa, Hayes Valley, the Mission District, Civic Center and Lower Haight; central/accessible to public transportation.
